price: 14. En alles wat op aarde is, opdat zij hem mogen redden.
arabic: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma yunjīhi
